price: Они пре њих су порицали, па их је стигла казна одакле нису очекивали.
arabic: كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَأَتَىٰهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kadhaba alladhīna min qablihim fa-atāhumu al-ʿadhābu min ḥaythu lā yashʿurūna
